option.modEnabled.name: Mod Enabled
option.modEnabled.tooltip: Enable or disable all world cheats.
option.openMenuKey.name: Open Menu Hotkey
option.openMenuKey.tooltip: Press this key to open this config menu directly.
option.instantBuildConstruction.name: Instant Building Construction
option.instantBuildConstruction.tooltip: New buildings finish constructing immediately when placed. Robin goes home right away. Skips on festival days and Green Rain year 1.
option.instantBuildUpgrade.name: Instant Building Upgrades
option.instantBuildUpgrade.tooltip: Building upgrades (e.g., barn to big barn) complete instantly instead of waiting days.
option.instantHouseUpgrade.name: Instant House Upgrades
option.instantHouseUpgrade.tooltip: Farmhouse upgrades from Robin complete instantly. Your house expands immediately after purchase.
option.instantCommunityUpgrade.name: Instant Community Upgrades
option.instantCommunityUpgrade.tooltip: Community upgrades like Pam's house and town shortcuts complete instantly.
option.freeBuildingConstruction.name: Free Building Construction
option.freeBuildingConstruction.tooltip: Buildings cost no gold or materials to construct. Works with Robin and the Wizard.
option.instantToolUpgrade.name: Instant Tool Upgrade
option.instantToolUpgrade.tooltip: Tool upgrades at Clint's blacksmith complete instantly. Your upgraded tool is ready the same day you drop it off.
option.instantMachineProcessing.name: Instant Machine Processing
option.instantMachineProcessing.tooltip: All machines (kegs, preserves jars, furnaces, cheese press, etc.) produce output instantly with zero processing time.
option.freeGeodeProcessing.name: Free Geode Processing
option.freeGeodeProcessing.tooltip: Processing geodes at Clint's blacksmith is free (normally costs 25g each).
option.freeShopPurchases.name: Free Shop Purchases
option.freeShopPurchases.tooltip: All shop purchases cost nothing. Works with Pierre, Robin, Clint, Marnie, Willy, Sandy, Krobus, the Traveling Cart, and all other shops.
option.freeCrafting.name: Free Crafting
option.freeCrafting.tooltip: Crafting recipes do not consume ingredients. You can craft anything even without the materials.
option.weatherForTomorrow.name: Tomorrow's Weather
option.weatherForTomorrow.tooltip: Override tomorrow's weather forecast. Set to 'No Override' to let the game decide normally. Applied at the start of each day.
